txt.en: 'Hullo! Would you like to be an \qAcquaintance\q of the Elves of Rivendell? Well look no further! Completion of this quest should do that just for you.\n\n'If this sounds good to you, speak to me again!'
'Alright, soon the Elves of Rivendell will consider you an Acquaintance. Ready?'
By completing this quest, you will be considered an Acquaintance of the Elves of Rivendell.
